channel.title: MLOps on Data Lab Tech TV
channel.description: Recent content in MLOps on Data Lab Tech TV

item.title: Data Lab Infra - Part 5: Retrospective & MLOps - Model Deployment
item.description: Learn how to use multi-project CI/CD with the GitLab Free tier, how to deploy an ML model with Docker, doing a retrospective and redesigning the architecture.

item.title: MLOps: A/B Testing with MLflow, Kafka, and DuckLake
item.description: Learn how to implement an end-to-end machine learning workflow, from data ingestion, to A/B testing and monitoring, using MLflow, Kafka and DuckLake.
